ai-patthana24.4:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.4:1.1_0: Not knowing the cause, the reason for seeing.
ai-patthana24.4:1.1_1: Not because of defilingment, the reason for the sake of defilements.
ai-patthana24.4:1.1_2: doesn’t arise because of defilements ... for the sake of defilements ...
ai-patthana24.4:2.1_0: Not Defilements for the sake of defilements ... for the sake of causes and reasons.
ai-patthana24.4:4.1_0: Nor does he give rise to thought, not for the sake of defilement.
ai-patthana24.4:5.1_0: Nor does cause the reason for the sake of Defilements.
ai-patthana24.4:5.1_1: Not Defilements for the sake of defilement, not for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana24.4:5.1_2: Nor do they arise because of defilement, but not for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana24.4:6.1_0: Nor does he give rise to defilement because of defilements ...
ai-patthana24.4:7.1_0: Not because of the cause, the reason for the sake of defilingment, the reason for the sake of purification of mind gives rise to heaven.
ai-patthana24.4:8.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause, the reason for the sake of defilements that arises.
ai-patthana24.4:10.1_0: No cause is a reason for the sake of defilingment.
ai-patthana24.4:11.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause, the reason for this: for the sake of defilements and for the sake of defiling influences,
ai-patthana24.4:12.1_0: Nor do they arise for the sake of defiling defilement, but for the sake of defilements.
ai-patthana24.4:13.1_0: Nor do they arise for the sake of defilingment and Defilements that give rise to defilement.
ai-patthana24.4:14.1_0: Nor do they arise because of defilement, but not because of defiling defilements, both for the sake of defiling influences.
ai-patthana24.4:15.1_0: Nor do they take pleasure in defilement.
